com.angel.sdk
Class BleController

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.angel.sdk.BleController

public class BleController
extends Service

Android service that handles all the low level GATT access.

Access to this class is completely encapsulated by more high level classes, so usually there is no need to access this class directly form the outside of the library.

Nested Class Summary
 class BleController.LocalBinder
          Used to retrieve the BleController instance from the client code.
